Who are
Prague Photographers?

A Band born out of passion and love for the city.

When innovation meets passion

We had the love and the skill for photography and a growing interest to help people settle and tour the city.

This passion then yielded a synergism between photography passion and staying in contact with foreigners to establish the PRAGUE PHOTOGRAPHERS COMPANY

Our Mission

We desire our entire clientele to have a lifetime experience from Prague and all the moment captured in beautiful photos that you can keep and trasure forever.

Meet Prague Photographers

Meet Us

Our Vision

To create a local platform that will be the #1 Photo-service in the Czech Republic, where photographers can meet with tourists and share beautiful moments.


WHY PRAGUE PHOTOGRAPHERS

Our photography entails a unique, creative, and fun-filled photo tour style. We are called peoples photographers for a reason, and we make all our customers feel happy and welcomed in our city!

Our Promise

Friendly professionals

Quality photos

Excellent customer service

Elegance and creativity
